conbody.p: The core entity in BundleMaker's resource model is IResource. A resource represent a file that is part of the system that should be modularized. E.g. a resource can be a ".java", a ".class" or an ".xml" file. Each resource belongs to project content entry that in the Bundlemaker project description. A resource is uniquely identified by content id, a root path and a relative path.
